<script>
    $('#name,#industry,#headquarters').parent('div').addClass('d-none');
  
  
    function redirectWebsite() {
        var LiDiv = document.getElementById('websitediv').parentNode;
        LiDiv.addEventListener("click", function () {
            window.open(document.getElementById('website').value, '_blank');
        })
    }
    
 
    

  function insertSkills() {
    pp3 = document.getElementById('specialities').value;
  
    
    if(pp3=="[]"){
        document.getElementById('div_specialties').style.display="none";
    }else{
        pp2=pp3.replace('[','');
        pp=pp2.replace(']','');
        pp=pp.split(',');
        skills=pp;
        //skills=pp;
        // console.log(skills);
        let list = document.getElementById('skill_list');
        // console.log(list)
        for (const skill in skills) {
          const li = document.createElement('li');
          li.innerHTML = `${skills[skill]}`;
          list.appendChild(li);
        }
            $("ul#skill_list li").addClass('float-start mx-1 mb-2 px-3 py-2 btn-yellow rounded-2 fs-5 epilogue-semiBold');
          $("ul#skill_list li").css('float','left')
    }
  
  }
    
        

   


    function RedirectProfileLinkedIn() {
        var LiDiv = document.getElementById('linkedindiv');
     //   console.log('div linikedin',LiDiv);
        LiDiv.addEventListener("click", function () {
         
            // let url = "";
            let link = document.getElementById('url').value;
            // url = url.concat('https://www.linkedin.com', link);
            window.open(link, '_blank');
        })
    }

    $( document ).ready(function() {
    sessionStorage.setItem('pageNav',"editableprofile");
    if(document.getElementById('company_description').value==""){
         document.getElementById('div_description').style.display="none";
         
    }
     if(document.getElementById('publication').value==""){
         document.getElementById('div_publication').style.display="none";
         
    }  
     if(document.getElementById('specialities').value==""){
         document.getElementById('div_specialties').style.display="none";
         
    }  
     if(document.getElementById('people').value==""){
         document.getElementById('peopleSection').style.display="none";
         
    }  
    
    var image="data:image/png;base64, ";
    document.getElementById('pro_img').src=image;
    
    document.getElementById('nameP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('name').value;
    document.getElementById('headP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('location').value;
    document.getElementById('locationsP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('location').value;
    document.getElementById('employeesP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('num_employees').value;
    document.getElementById('industryP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('institution').value;
    document.getElementById('typeP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('discipline').value;
    document.getElementById('foundedP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('founded_date').value;
    document.getElementById('descriptionP').innerHTML=document.getElementById('company_description').value;
   // document.getElementById('linkedindiv').innerHTML=document.getElementById('url').value.replace('https://www.linkedin.com','');
    document.getElementById('websitediv').innerHTML=document.getElementById('website').value.replace('https://www.','');
    document.getElementById('phonediv').innerHTML=document.getElementById('phone').value;
    insertSkills();
    redirectWebsite();


});

</script>
<style>
    ul{
list-style-type:none;
}

#html section{
     display:none!important;
}


</style>
